meanings.sent1: The miners dug tunnels to reach the precious gems.
meanings.sent2: The subway train traveled through the dark tunnel.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky rabbit used the tunnel to escape from the fox.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed through the tunnel of her mind, seeking clarity.
meanings.sent5: The tunnel was so narrow that only one person could pass through at a time.

meanings.sent1: The construction workers tunnels through the mountain for the new road.
meanings.sent2: The ants tunneled through the soft soil to build their nest.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended to tunnel through the snow in their backyard.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree tunneled deep into the ground in search of water.
meanings.sent5: The mole tunneled swiftly through the earth, leaving a trail behind.

meanings.sent1: The train tunnels under the city to reach the next station.
meanings.sent2: The cars tunneled through the traffic to get to the concert on time.
meanings.sent3: The swimmer tunneled through the water with graceful strokes.
meanings.sent4: The hikers tunneled through the dense forest, following the trail.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship tunneled through the atmosphere, heading towards the moon.
